entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:21 a.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries and periods of ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain late this morning and this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Ice pellets or snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to snow mixed with freezing rain late in the afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
